title: You’re The One That I Want
lyrics:
[Verse]
I got chills, they're multiplyin'
And I'm losing control
'Cause the power you're supplyin'
It's electrifyin'
Want you, I want you, to keep you, I got to
[Pre-Chorus]
I better shape up (Ooh, why?)
'Cause I need a plan (Uh-uh-uh-ooh, I)
And my heart is set on you (Heart is set on you)
I better shape up, I better understand
To my heart, I must be true
Nothin' left, nothin' left for me to do
[Chorus]
You're the one that I want
You are the one I want, ooh-ooh-ooh
You're the one that I want
You are the one I want, ooh-ooh-ooh (You're the onе I want)
You're the one that I want
You arе the one I want, ooh-ooh-ooh
The one I need (The one I need)
Oh, yes, indeed (Oh, yes, indeed, yay)
You're the one that I want
You are the one I want, ooh-ooh-ooh (You're the one I want)
You're the one that I want
You are the one I want, ooh-ooh-ooh
You're the one that I want
You are the one I want, ooh-ooh-ooh (Ah)
The one I need (The one I need)
Oh, yes, indeed (Yes, indeed)
